recipe.title: Chambord Spritzer
ingredients: A twist of lemon peel for garnish
instructions: In a tall glass combine the Chambord, the wine, the lemon juice, and 4 ice cubes. Fill the glass with the seltzer and stir the drink. Garnish it with the lemon peel.
